description.ko_KR: 폭발에 휘말린 적에게 현란한 난무 이후 파괴적인 불기둥으로 마무리합니다.

description.en_US: Summon Landrunners that make a march and crush the enemy, and then explodes together.
description.de_DE: Summon Landrunners that make a march and crush the enemy, and then explodes together.
description.zh_CN: Summon Landrunners that make a march and crush the enemy, and then explodes together.
description.ja_JP: Summon Landrunners that make a march and crush the enemy, and then explodes together.
description.ko_KR: 적에게 몸통박치기를 하면서 진격하고, 일제히 자폭하는 랜드러너 중대를 소환합니다.

name.ja_JP: \i[class-sphero] クリムゾンストライク

description.en_US: Dash through your enemies while leaving a trail of fire.
description.de_DE: Fege durch deine Feinde hindurch und hinterlasse eine Flammenspur.
description.zh_CN: 从敌人中间冲刺而过，留下一道火焰轨迹。造成\c[3]燃烧\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.ko_KR: 불길을 남기며 적을 향해 대시합니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.zh_TW: 從敵人中間衝刺而過，留下一道火焰軌跡。造成\c[3]燃燒\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.en_US: Place a mine that explodes when enemies are nearby.
description.de_DE: Platziere eine Mine, die explodiert, sobald ein Gegner in der Nähe ist.

description.ko_KR: 근처에 적이 있을 때 터지는 지뢰를 설치합니다.
description.zh_TW: 放置一個炸彈，當敵人靠近時會爆炸。

description.en_US: A rapid spinning dash attack that hits all enemies along the way.

Ignite enemies with an intense spinning attack.
description.ko_KR: 강렬한 회전공격으로 적을 불사릅니다.

name.ja_JP: \i[class-sphero] クリムゾンストリーム

description.en_US: Surround yourself with fire and dash a long way, leaving hot damaging magma on the ground.
description.de_DE: Ummantele dich mit Feuer und presche weit vor, während du eine Magmaspur hinterlässt.

description.ja_JP: 炎をまとって長距離ダッシュし、敵にダメージを与えるマグマを地面に残す。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.zh_TW: 以火焰包圍自己，並猛衝一長段距離，在地上留下具有傷害性的灼熱岩漿。造成\c[3]燃燒\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.en_US: Dash and place multiple mines which can seek enemies when not touched.
description.de_DE: Dashe und platziere mehrere Minen, die sich ihre Ziele suchen, wenn sie nicht berührt werden.

description.ko_KR: 저돌적인 도약 공격과 함께 강력한 원형 화염 장벽을 생성해 적을 가둬버립니다.

name.ja_JP: \i[class-sphero] スカーレット・レイン<<A<<[CHANGED 2017/11/27]

description.de_DE: Dashe durch deine Gegner und markiere sie, um sie von einem lodernden Meteoritenschauer bombardieren zu lassen.

description.ko_KR: 적에게 대시하여 표시된 적에 불타는 유성우가 빗발칩니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.zh_TW: 通過衝刺標記敵人，被標記的敵人將被火焰流星雨轟炸。造成\c[3]燃燒\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.en_US: Hit an enemy into the air to be blasted by a powerful heatwave, also catching surrounding enemies in the blast.

name.ja_JP: \i[class-sphero] リコイルトランペット

description.en_US: Perfect guard an attack and counter with a flaming explosion.
description.de_DE: Pariere einen Angriff und kontere mit einer feurigen Explosion.
description.zh_CN: 完美防御一次攻击，并以火焰爆炸进行还击。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.zh_TW: 完美防禦一次攻擊，並以火焰爆炸進行還擊。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

Sacrifice \c[1]-25%\c[0] of your HP and increase your ATK by \c[2]+15%\c[0] for a moderate period. Can be stacked at your own risk.

description.ko_KR: 자신 주변에 검의 고리를 만들어 그 안에 들어오는 적에게 대미지를 입힙니다.

description.zh_TW: 完美防禦一次攻擊，跳到空中並以灼熱的激光束進行反擊。造成\c[3]燃燒\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.de_DE: Beschwöre einen lang anhaltenden Feuerkreis, der in starken Eruptionen Feuer ausspeit.

Draw in enemies and then engulf them in lingering fires.

name.ja_JP: \i[class-sphero] イグナイト・エンバー<<A<<[CHANGED 2017/11/04]

description.ko_KR: 대량의 얼음송곳을 빠르게 쏩니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.zh_TW: 快速射出一連串冰刺。造成\c[3]寒冷\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.de_DE: Triff deine Feinde mit einer wuchtigen Schnee-Explosion, die sie in Eiskristalle fängt.

Toss an icicle spell card aimed at your cursor position.
Throws an ice hook that strongly pulls in enemies.
description.ko_KR: 적을 강하게 끌어당기는 얼음 갈고리를 던집니다.

description.ja_JP: 巨大な雪玉を発射し、当たった敵をつららの檻に閉じ込める。雪玉の通った後につららが発生する。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ko_KR: 거대한 눈 뭉치를 쏘며, 고드름 길을 만들고 적을 다수의 고드름에 가둡니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.zh_TW: 射出一枚大型的雪球，留下一道冰錐之徑，並以多枚冰錐覆蓋敵人。造成\c[3]寒冷\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.ko_KR: 적을 가까이 끌어당기는 얼음 사슬 갈고리를 던집니다.

description.de_DE: Beschwöre ein eisgepanzertes Geschütz und puste deine Feinde mit einer Salve Eiszapfen weg.

description.en_US: Swing your sword to shoot three powerful frost rays that pierce all enemies.

description.de_DE: Lange Aufladephase für massiven Schaden.

description.en_US: Performs a stationary ice whirl attack with wide range and strong knockback.
description.de_DE: Ein stehender Eiswirbelschlag mit großer Reichweite und starkem Rückstoß.
description.zh_CN: 施展一次固定的冰系旋风斩，范围大击退力强。

description.en_US: Blast enemies with a spontaneous eruption of ice chunks before slashing them away.

Punch enemies and trap them in a valley of icicles.
Pierce an enemy in front of you with an ice spear.
description.ko_KR: 얼음 창으로 눈앞의 적을 꿰뚫어버린다.

description.en_US: Summon Snowflake that rushing to the enemy.
description.de_DE: Summon Snowflake that rushing to the enemy.
description.zh_CN: Summon Snowflake that rushing to the enemy.
description.ja_JP: Summon Snowflake that rushing to the enemy.

description.en_US: Take a stand and do massive damage with 3 frozen stars.
description.de_DE: Beschwöre eine 3-Hit Eiskristallkombo für massiven Schaden.
description.zh_CN: 站定位置，以3颗冰冻之星造成巨额伤害。造成\c[3]寒冷\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.zh_TW: 站定位置，以3顆冰凍之星造成巨額傷害。造成\c[3]寒冷\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.en_US: Extend the Ice Twirl by sucking in enemies with multiple hits and then ejecting them.
description.de_DE: Sauge Gegner mit mehreren Treffern ein und schleudere sie weg.

description.ja_JP: アイストワールの強化版。敵を引き寄せながら多段ヒットした後、敵を吹き飛ばす。
description.ko_KR: 얼음 소용돌이를 확장하여 다수의 타격으로 적을 빨아들이고 다시 밀어냅니다.
description.zh_TW: 施放一次強大的冰旋風攻擊，範圍廣，附帶強大的擊退效果。

description.en_US: Hit a single enemy with a short-range combo to knock them into a powerful icicle rupture.
Perform a large swirling area attack that spawns a ring of frozen stars.
Summon Freezeflake that rushing to the enemy.
description.de_DE: Summon Freezeflake that rushing to the enemy.
description.zh_CN: Summon Freezeflake that rushing to the enemy.
description.ja_JP: Summon Freezeflake that rushing to the enemy.
description.ko_KR: 적에게 돌진하는 얼음송이를 소환합니다.

description.en_US: Move forward while blasting enemies in front of you with freezing wind.

name.ja_JP: \i[class-sphero] エターナルウィンター<<A<<[CHANGED 2017/11/27]

description.en_US: Take a stand and conjure a massive frozen ice spear from the ground that impales your enemies.
description.de_DE: Beschwöre einen gewaltigen Eisspeer, der deine Feinde pfählt.
description.zh_CN: 站定位置，从地面召唤巨型冰枪刺穿敌人。造成\c[3]寒冷\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/11/15]
description.ja_JP: 覚悟を決め、巨大な氷の槍を地面から召喚して敵を突き刺す。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/11/15]
description.ko_KR: 가만히 선 채, 지면에서 적을 찌르는 거대한 얼음송곳을 생성합니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/11/15]
description.zh_TW: 站定位置，從地面召喚巨型冰槍刺穿敵人。造成\c[3]寒冷\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/11/15]

name.ja_JP: \i[class-sphero] ポーラー・ピルエット<<A<<[CHANGED 2017/11/27]

description.en_US: Begin a dance of multiple huge ice whirl attacks and lock enemies in and end it all with a massive pirouette that blast enemies away.
description.de_DE: Beginne mit einem Eiswirbeltanz, der die Gegner lähmt und sie in einer gewaltigen Pirouette wegschleudert.
description.zh_CN: 开始进行超大范围的冰风攻击锁定敌人，最后再用回旋震开敌人。<<A<<[CHANGED 2017/12/12]
description.ja_JP: 多段ヒットする巨大な氷の回転攻撃で、踊りながら敵を攻撃する。ダンスの最後につまさき立ちで回転し、敵を吹き飛ばす。<<A<<[CHANGED 2017/11/27]
description.ko_KR: 다수의 거대 얼음 소용돌이 공격으로 춤을 시작하고, 적을 그 안에 가둬 적을 날려버리는 거대한 피루엣으로 마무리합니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2017/11/20]
description.zh_TW: 開始進行超大範圍的冰風攻擊鎖定敵人，最後再用迴旋震開敵人。<<A<<[CHANGED 2017/12/12]

description.en_US: Draw in enemies before lunging forward, striking a single enemy with a powerful icicle rupture and avalanche.
Engulf enemies in a swirling hurricane before finishing with a powerful slash. Can also hit flying enemies.
Summon Cryogen armed with icicles and snowflakes.
description.de_DE: Summon Cryogen armed with icicles and snowflakes.
description.zh_CN: Summon Cryogen armed with icicles and snowflakes.
description.ja_JP: Summon Cryogen armed with icicles and snowflakes.
description.ko_KR: 고드름 연발과 눈송이 소환 공격으로 무장한 크라이오젠을 소환합니다.

name.ja_JP: \i[class-sphero] インディゴストライク

description.en_US: Dash with high speed, leaving a trail of icicles behind you, damaging enemies on contact.
description.de_DE: Ein schneller Dash, der Eiskristalle hinterlässt, die Gegner bei Kontakt verwunden.
description.zh_CN: 高速冲刺，在冲刺路线上留下一道冰柱，并对接触的敌人造成伤害。造成\c[3]寒冷\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ja_JP: 高速でダッシュし、通った後につららを残す。つららに触れた敵はダメージを受ける。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ko_KR: 고속으로 대시하고 뒤에 고드름 길을 남겨 이에 닿는 적에게 대미지를 가합니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.zh_TW: 高速衝刺，在衝刺路線上留下一道冰柱，並對接觸的敵人造成傷害。造成\c[3]寒冷\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.en_US: Lunge through enemies with an icy blade, leaving behind a trail of frozen stars.
Dash a long distance, leaving icicles which create multiple additional icicle trails.
description.de_DE: Ein langer Dash, der Eiskristalle hinterlässt, die noch mehr Eiskristalle erzeugen.
description.zh_CN: 猛冲一长段距离，在身后留下冰锥，额外生成多条冰锥之径。造成\c[3]寒冷\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ja_JP: 長距離をダッシュし、通った後につららを残す。このつららはさらにつららの列をいくつか発生させる。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ko_KR: 장거리를 대시하고 다수의 추가 고드름 길을 만드는 고드름을 남깁니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.zh_TW: 猛衝一長段距離，在身後留下冰錐，額外生成多條冰錐之徑。造成\c[3]寒冷\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.en_US: Perform a fast dash that attacks one enemy and freezes them solid. Victim gains \c[3]+30%\c[0] DEF while frozen.
Perfect guard an attack and counter with a cold strike, slowing down your enemy.
description.de_DE: Pariere einen Angriff und kontere mit einem Frostschlag, der den Gegner verlangsamt.
description.zh_CN: 完美防御一次攻击，同时还击并降低敌人的速度。
description.ja_JP: パーフェクトガードで攻撃を受け、敵の動きを遅くする氷の一撃でカウンター攻撃をする。
description.ko_KR: 공격을 완벽히 방어하고 적을 느리게 만드는 차가운 공격으로 반격합니다.
description.zh_TW: 完美防禦一次攻擊，同時還擊並降低敵人的速度。

description.en_US: Blast enemies away and spawn several icicles in front of you, blocking projectiles and damaging enemies on contact.
description.de_DE: Stoße Gegner weg und verbarrikadiere dich hinter Eiskristallen, die Projektile blocken und Gegner bei Kontakt verwunden.
description.zh_CN: 在你的前方召唤出数根冰柱，阻挡敌人的射击。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ja_JP: 近くにいる敵を吹き飛ばし、つららを前方に数個発生させる。つららは触れた敵にダメージを与え、飛び道具も防いでくれる。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ko_KR: 적을 날려버리고 자신의 앞에 다수의 고드름을 생성해 발사체를 막고 이에 닿는 적에 대미지를 가합니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.zh_TW: 在你的前方召喚出數根冰柱，阻擋敵人的射擊。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.ko_KR: \i[class-tri] 적을 날려버리고 자신의 앞에 다수의 고드름을 생성해 발사체를 막고 이에 닿는 적에 대미지를 가합니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.de_DE: Pariere einen Angriff und friere den Gegner komplett ein, um weitere Angriffe zu landen.
description.zh_CN: 完美防御一次攻击，并完全冻住敌人，使其承受额外的攻击。

description.zh_TW: 完美防禦一次攻擊，並完全凍住敵人，使其承受額外的攻擊。

name.ja_JP: \i[class-sphero] アイス・フォートレス

description.en_US: Spawn multiple icicles around you and envelop yourself in a protective but slowing shield.
description.de_DE: Beschwöre einige Eiskristalle und hülle dich in einen schützenden, doch verlangsamenden Schild.
description.zh_CN: 在身周衍生多枚冰锥，并创造一道具有防护性，但会减慢速度的护盾。<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/04/16]
description.ja_JP: 周りにつららシールドを発生させるが、動きは遅くなる。<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/04/16]
description.ko_KR: 주변에 다수의 고드름을 생성해 자신을 보호해 주지만 느려지는 방어막을 만들어 자신을 감쌉니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/04/16]
description.zh_TW: 在身周衍生多枚冰錐，並創造一道具有防護性，但會減慢速度的護盾。<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/04/16]

description.en_US: A barrage of icicles and hailstones are unleased in a flurry of slashes over a wide area.
Quickly encase yourself in ice for longer, negating even more damage and healing \c[2]+25%\c[0] of your maximum HP while frozen. Dash-cancelable.
Perfect guard an attack, initiate a quick combo and completely freeze all enemies in front of you.
description.de_DE: Pariere einen Angriff, kontere mit einer schnellen Kombo und friere alle Gegner vor dir ein.
description.zh_CN: 完美防御一次攻击，进行一次快速连击并将面前的所有敌人冻住。造成\c[3]寒冷\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ja_JP: パーフェクトガードで攻撃を受けてから素早いコンボで反撃し、目の前にいるすべての敵を完全に凍らせる。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ko_KR: 공격을 완벽히 방어하고 빠른 콤보를 시전하여 앞에 있는 모든 적을 완전히 얼립니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.zh_TW: 完美防禦一次攻擊，進行一次快速連擊並將面前的所有敵人凍住。造成\c[3]寒冷\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.en_US: Winter is here. Summon multiple huge icicles around you and envelop yourself in a powerful protective shield.
description.de_DE: Der Winter ist hier. Beschwöre viele mächtige Eiskristalle und hülle dich in einen mächtigen Schild.
description.zh_CN: 寒冬已至。在你的身边召唤数枚巨型冰枪，然后创造一个强力保护性屏障。<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/04/16]
description.ja_JP: 無慈悲なる冬の到来。自身の周りに巨大なつららを複数召喚するとともに、バリアを発生させる。<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/04/16]
description.ko_KR: 겨울이 다가왔습니다. 주변에 다수의 거대 고드름을 소환하며, 강력한 방어력을 갖춘 방어막으로 자신을 감쌉니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/04/16]
description.zh_TW: 寒冬已至。在你的身邊召喚數枚巨型冰槍，然後創造一個強力保護性屏障。<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/04/16]

description.en_US: Summon a field of powerful icicles to impale enemies in the area.
Construct a towering ice platform and freeze yourself to heal \c[2]+40%\c[0] of your HP and cure status effects.
Throw a projectile that creates a delayed lightning bolt damaging everything around it.
description.de_DE: Feuere ein Projektil, das einen verzögerten Blitz auf Feind und Umgebung krachen lässt.
description.zh_CN: 投掷标记，一段延迟后造对周围敌人造成闪电伤害。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ja_JP: 電撃を放つ攻撃。当たった敵には一瞬遅れて雷が落ち、その周囲にもダメージが行く。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ko_KR: 발사체 주변에 있는 모든 것에 번갯불의 딜레이 대미지를 가하는 발사체를 던집니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.zh_TW: 投擲標記，一段延遲後造對周圍敵人造成閃電傷害。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.en_US: Shoot an array of small homing projectiles.
description.de_DE: Feuere eine Salve zielsuchender Projektile.
description.zh_CN: 射出一连串小型跟踪飞弹。
description.ja_JP: ホーミング性能を持つ小さな電撃を大量に放つ攻撃。
description.ko_KR: 작은 자동 유도 발사체를 쏩니다.
description.zh_TW: 射出一連串小型跟蹤飛彈。

description.en_US: Throw two very fast, accurate, and piercing lightning bolts.
Throw out magnetic prisms that will zap the enemy you proceed to mark with a projectile.
Toss a Jolt Hex spell card aimed at your cursor position.
Summon Wisp firing lightning at nearby enemies.
description.de_DE: Summon Wisp firing lightning at nearby enemies.
description.zh_CN: Summon Wisp firing lightning at nearby enemies.
description.ja_JP: Summon Wisp firing lightning at nearby enemies.
description.ko_KR: 주변의 적에게 번갯불을 발사하는 위스프를 소환합니다.

description.en_US: Throw a projectile that chases an enemy before striking with a lightning bolt.
Fire a projectile that creates a chain along up to 4 enemies which will get hit by a lightning bolt.
description.de_DE: Feuere ein Projektil, das bis zu vier Gegner verkettet, die dann von einem Blitz getroffen werden.
description.zh_CN: 射出一枚炮弹，连接至多4名敌人并对其进行电击。造成\c[3]触电\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ja_JP: 最大で4体の敵に連鎖する電撃を放つ攻撃。当たった敵には、周囲にもダメージを与える雷が落ちる。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ko_KR: 최대 넷의 적을 묶어 번갯불의 공격을 받을 체인을 만드는 발사체를 발사합니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.zh_TW: 射出一枚砲彈，連接至多4名敵人並對其進行電擊。造成\c[3]觸電\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

name.ja_JP: \i[class-sphero] ライトニングスワーム

description.en_US: Throw a shock ball that will bounce off an enemy and create a sphere that emits multiple homing projectiles.
description.de_DE: Feuere einen Schockball, der von einem Gegner abprallt und eine Kugel erzeugt, die zielsuchende Projektile emittiert.
description.zh_CN: 投掷一个闪电球，击中敌人后会反弹，并生成一颗球体，射出多枚归航导弹。
description.ja_JP: 電撃の玉を放つ攻撃。玉は敵に当たると跳ね返り、大量のホーミング弾を放つ大きな球体を発生させる。
description.ko_KR: 적에게 맞고 튀어 나오는 전기 공을 던지고 다수의 자동 유도 발사체를 내뿜는 구를 만듭니다.
description.zh_TW: 投擲一個閃電球，擊中敵人後會反彈，並生成一顆球體，射出多枚歸航導彈。

description.en_US: Throw three straight bolts that pierce enemies and deal lingering damage.
Throw a slow-moving electric prism that zaps nearby enemies as it travels.
Magnet Prism except shaped like a hexagon.
Summon Hi Wisp firing lightning at nearby enemies.
description.de_DE: Summon Hi Wisp firing lightning at nearby enemies.
description.zh_CN: Summon Hi Wisp firing lightning at nearby enemies.
description.ja_JP: Summon Hi Wisp firing lightning at nearby enemies.
description.ko_KR: 주변의 적에게 번갯불을 발사하는 하이 위스프를 소환합니다.

description.en_US: Throw a projectile that slowly seeks an enemy before moving in for a final strike.
It's hammer time. Throw a ball that chains multiple enemies together and evaporates them with a massive lightning bolt.
description.de_DE: Hol den Hammer raus! Feuere ein Projektil, das mehrere Gegner verkettet und sie dann mit einem gigantsichen Blitz vaporisiert.
description.zh_CN: 射出一枚炮弹，连接多个敌人，随后用巨型闪电摧毁他们。<<A<<[CHANGED 2017/12/12]
description.ja_JP: 審判が下される。球体を放って複数の敵をつなぎ留めたのち、巨大な稲妻でまとめて消し去る攻撃。<<A<<[CHANGED 2017/11/27]
description.ko_KR: 망치를 휘두를 시간입니다! 다수의 적을 함께 묶어놓는 공을 던지며 대규모의 번개로 증발시킵니다. <<A<<[CHANGED 2017/11/20]
description.zh_TW: 射出一枚砲彈，連接多個敵人，隨後用巨型閃電摧毀他們。<<A<<[CHANGED 2017/12/12]

description.en_US: Call upon the help of the gods and summon 3 spheres that spam an enemy with bullets and finish it off with a lightning explosion.
description.de_DE: Rufe die Götter zu Hilfe und beschwöre drei Kugeln, die den Feind mit einem Kugelhagel und einer Blitz-Explosion malträtieren.
description.zh_CN: 呼唤神灵的帮助，召唤出三个球体对一个敌人疯狂射击，最后用一场闪电爆炸终结。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/07/09]
description.ja_JP: 神に助けを求め、大量の弾丸を無差別に放つ球体を3つ召喚する。最後に稲妻の爆発をお見舞いする。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/07/09]
description.ko_KR: 신에게 도움을 요청해 총알로 적을 차단하고 번개 폭발로 마무리하는 3개의 구를 소환합니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/07/09]
description.zh_TW: 呼喚神靈的幫助，召喚出三個球體對一個敵人瘋狂射擊，最後用一場閃電爆炸終結。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/07/09]

description.en_US: Throw two large, rotating lightning storms that draw in enemies and deal heavy damage as they travel, striking all in their path.
Hit a single enemy to unleash a devastating attack involving advanced magnet prisms.
Summon Ultra Wisp firing lightning at nearby enemies.
description.de_DE: Summon Ultra Wisp firing lightning at nearby enemies.
description.zh_CN: Summon Ultra Wisp firing lightning at nearby enemies.
description.ja_JP: Summon Ultra Wisp firing lightning at nearby enemies.
description.ko_KR: 주변의 적에게 번갯불을 발사하는 울트라 위스프를 소환합니다.

description.en_US: Attack with a series of multiple fast spin attacks within a small radius.
description.de_DE: Greife mit einer Reihe schneller Wirbelattacken mit kleinem Radius an.
description.zh_CN: 施展一系列小范的快速旋转攻击。
description.zh_TW: 施展一系列小范的快速旋轉攻擊。
description.ja_JP: 高速な回転攻撃で敵に多段ヒットする。攻撃範囲は小さい。
description.ko_KR: 적은 반경에서 다수의 빠른 스핀 공격으로 공격합니다.

description.en_US: Hit a single enemy into the air following up with a lightning strike.
description.de_DE: Schlage einen einzelnen Gegner in die Luft und triff ihn mit einem Blitzschlag.
description.zh_CN: 击飞单体敌人，然后用闪电攻击。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ja_JP: 敵単体を空に叩き上げ、雷で追撃する攻撃。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ko_KR: 하나의 적을 공중으로 띄운 뒤 번개로 공격합니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.zh_TW: 擊飛單體敵人，然後用閃電攻擊。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.en_US: A wide swing with a special sword that releases a swarm of electric bees.
Strike an enemy with a quick thrust. If hit, three shadow sparks will surround and attack the enemy after some time.

description.zh_CN: 以高速猛冲穿过敌人，牵引身后的敌人并造成强大的爆炸。造成\c[3]标记\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ja_JP: 高速ダッシュで通り抜けた敵を、自分の通った道に引き込み、さらに強力な爆発を引き起こす。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ko_KR: 고속으로 적을 향해 대시한 뒤 강력한 폭발이 일어나기 전에 자신의 뒤쪽으로 끌어당깁니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.zh_TW: 以高速猛衝穿過敵人，牽引身後的敵人並造成強大的爆炸。造成\c[3]標記\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

name.ja_JP: \i[class-sphero] トキシックファントム

description.en_US: Dash away and leave behind a deadly decoy that distracts and damages your foes.
description.de_DE: Dashe dich in Sicherheit und hinterlasse einen Lockvogel, der deine Feinde ablenkt und ihnen Schaden zufügt.
description.zh_CN: 飞速离开并在身后留下致命的诱饵，转移敌人注意并对其造成伤害。造成\c[3]标记\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ja_JP: ダッシュで離脱しつつ、敵の注意を引きダメージも与える強力な残像を残す。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ko_KR: 대시로 도망간 뒤 적을 교란하고 대미지를 입히는 치명적인 미끼를 남깁니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.zh_TW: 飛速離開並在身後留下致命的誘餌，轉移敵人注意並對其造成傷害。造成\c[3]標記\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.en_US: The enemy hit by your dash dissolves into scattered wave energy, taking massive damage when it re-forms. Hits enemies with frontal shields.
Soul Shatter except with hexagon effects, and no sword animations.
Dash away and leave behind a decoy that will carry out a basic attack.

name.ja_JP: \i[class-sphero] ボルテックス・タイド<<A<<[CHANGED 2017/11/27]

description.en_US: Charge up by creating a Vortex behind you and blast off leaving behind a huge wave explosion.
description.de_DE: Lade dich durch einen gewaltigen Vortex hinter dir auf, stürme los und hinterlasse eine heftige Welle-Explosion.
description.zh_CN: 通过在背后创造漩涡来进行冲刺，在原地留下巨大的波元素爆破。<<A<<[CHANGED 2017/12/12]
description.ja_JP: 背後に波動の渦を発生させながら力を溜めた後、背後に巨大な波動の爆発を残して猛発進する。<<A<<[CHANGED 2017/11/27]
description.ko_KR: 뒤쪽에 소용돌이를 만들어 충전하며 거대 파동 폭발을 남기며 적을 날립니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2017/11/20]
description.zh_TW: 通過在背後創造漩渦來進行衝刺，在原地留下巨大的波元素爆破。<<A<<[CHANGED 2017/12/12]

description.en_US: Dash through and create 4 decoys that pummel an enemy multiple times ending with a combined wave attack.
description.de_DE: Erschaffe vier Lockvögel durch einen Dash, die einen Gegner mehrmals angreifen und ihm mit einer kombinierten Welle-Attacke erledigen.
description.zh_CN: 进行冲刺，创造4个分身并对一个敌人进行连续攻击，然后用波动连击终结。造成\c[3]标记\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ja_JP: 敵をダッシュで通り抜け、4体の残像を生み出す。残像は敵単体を複数回殴打し、最後に波動による合同攻撃をお見舞いする。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ko_KR: 사이로 대시하여 적을 타격하는 미끼를 4개 생성하고, 결합한 파동 공격으로 마무리합니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.zh_TW: 進行衝刺，創造4個分身並對一個敵人進行連續攻擊，然後用波動連擊終結。造成\c[3]標記\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.en_US: Dash into an enemy to target them for a relentless bombardment, during which they will be slowed.
Dash away and leave behind an army of decoys that will use more powerful attacks.
Spawns aura that pushes away nearby enemies for several seconds.
description.de_DE: Aktiviere eine Aura, die nahe Gegner für einige Sekunden wegstößt.
description.zh_CN: 召唤一个光环，在数秒内阻挡周围敌人靠近。
description.zh_TW: 召喚一個光環，在數秒內阻擋周圍敵人靠近。
description.ja_JP: 近くの敵を押し返すオーラを、自身の周囲に数秒間発生させる。
description.ko_KR: 근처의 적을 몇 초간 밀어내는 아우라를 생성합니다.

description.en_US: Block one attack and regenerate part of the blocked damage.
description.de_DE: Blocke einen Angriff und regeneriere einen Teil des geblockten Schadens.
description.zh_CN: 格挡一次进攻，并基于所格挡的伤害恢复一定的HP。
description.ja_JP: 攻撃を一度だけ防ぎ、防いだダメージの一定の割合だけHPを回復する。
description.ko_KR: 공격을 한 번 차단하고 차단된 대미지의 일부를 재생합니다.
description.zh_TW: 格擋一次進攻，並基於所格擋的傷害恢復一定的HP。

description.en_US: Summons three orbiting wave turrets that shoot nearby enemies.
Block frontal attacks and recover some of the blocked damage for a short time.
Spawns aura that pushes away nearby enemies and throws projectiles for several seconds.
description.de_DE: Aktiviere eine Aura, die nahe Gegner wegstößt und für ein paar Sekunden Projektile auf sie feuert.
description.zh_CN: 衍生光环，击退附近的敌人，并能在几秒钟之内投掷飞弹。
description.ja_JP: 近くの敵を押し返し、さらに弾丸も発射するオーラを、自身の周囲に数秒間発生させる。
description.ko_KR: 근처의 적을 몇 초간 밀어내고 발사체를 던지는 아우라를 생성합니다.
description.zh_TW: 衍生光環，擊退附近的敵人，並能在幾秒鐘之內投擲飛彈。

description.en_US: Block all attacks for a few seconds and regenerate part of the blocked damage.
description.de_DE: Blocke alle Angriffe für ein paar Sekunden und regeneriere einen Teil des geblockten Schadens.
description.zh_CN: 短时间内格挡全部攻击，并恢复部分格挡的伤害。
description.ja_JP: すべての攻撃を数秒間防ぎ、防いだダメージの一定の割合だけHPを回復する。
description.ko_KR: 몇 초간 모든 공격을 차단하고 차단된 대미지의 일부를 재생합니다.
description.zh_TW: 短時間內格擋全部攻擊，並恢復部分格擋的傷害。

description.en_US: Quickly teleport into the air, then crash down with an explosion.
Empower your sword with a healing essence, causing all standard attacks to emit healing projectiles for a time.
Enter critical mode but become invincible. Absorb any enemy attacks for a short time. The more absorbed, the larger the ending explosion and the more HP healed.
description.de_DE: Werde unverwundbar im kritischen Modus. Absorbiere jegliche Angriffe für kurze Zeit. Je mehr absorbiert wurde, desto länger die finale Explosion und desto mehr HP werden geheilt.
description.zh_CN: 将血量降低至极限并获得无敌状态。短时间内吸收敌人的所有攻击。吸收的伤害越多，最终爆炸伤害越高，回复的血量也越多。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/05/01]
description.zh_TW: 將血量降低至極限並獲得無敵狀態。短時間內吸收敵人的所有攻擊。吸收的傷害越多，最終爆炸傷害越高，回覆的血量也越多。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/05/01]
description.ja_JP: 瀕死状態になるが、短い間無敵状態になり、最後に爆発を起こしてHPを回復する。無敵時間中はあらゆる攻撃を吸収し、たくさん吸収するほど最後の爆発の規模と回復HPが増える。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/05/01]
description.ko_KR: 치명상 상태가 되는 대신 무적이 됩니다. 잠시 동안 적의 모든 공격을 흡수합니다. 더 많은 공격을 흡수할수록 더 큰 폭발을 일으키며, 더 많은 HP가 회복됩니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/05/01]

description.en_US: Perfect guard an attack and infect your attacker, who violently explodes shortly after.
